## RpcCallProxy class

RPC调用代理 负责发送RPC调用并处理响应

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class RpcCallProxy extends EventEmitter 
```
**Extends:** [EventEmitter](./ecs-framework-monorepo.eventemitter.md)
